Title: Object: Papyrus Chester Beatty 10
Description: Papyrus Chester Beatty X (forty-one fragments); Hieratic magical text verso and recto. Recto: 1-2, Verso 1-2. Recto: From a Book of Aphrodisiacs. Verso: Further Portions of the Same.
Curator's comments: Published: Gardiner, Hieratic Papyri Vol. 1, pp. 114-5, Vol. 2, Plates 62 & 62A, Recto 1-2; Plate 63, Verso 1-2.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381082) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381082)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: displaced fragments, bloom, fractured, loss Black ink Red ink Tabbed: court plaster Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alfred Chester Beatty
Donated by: Lady Edith Chester Beatty
